page.title: 08A view of Moreton Morrell.
page.content: {Moreton Morrell}is a quiet little village with a population of nearly 600.It is about 7 miles south from Warwick and is in{Warwickshire. Middle Town was once the village; it had a small chapel that has now been converted into a house. Most of the houses were built in the 19th.Century, though some are timbered cottages that are much older. There is one shop, one pub, one church and one school. I think there should be more amusements for the young. Some of the old people say that the village is changing. But I think the village is old fashioned. Quite a lot of old people live in the village. In Oak Tree Close there are bungalows for the old people. All in all everybody in the village is very friendly.
